title: Remake's not working
body: When the 3 min came, it didn't matter if anyone got 1st blood, as long as someone's not connected to the game upon thy time, but lately, you can't even remake now for some odd reason, so you have to wait out for a 15 min match (20 if someone hits no) and everyone's on edge w/one another.

replies.body: Happened to me too. We started the game with a teammate DCed. Thought for sure we would be able to remake. Never happened.
100 remake discussions later and the one they pick out is about a boosted monkey, rito pls xd.
